title: The Kingdom Of Bhutan Has Been Quietly Mining Bitcoin For Years
author: Iain Martin
description: The Himalayan kingdom confirmed it has been running a bitcoin mining operation as mystery surrounds the scale of its earlier cryptocurrency investments.

title: A New ChatGPT-Powered Bot Named Satoshi Will Soon Help Crypto Traders
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: As the digital-assets industry tries to figure out how to incorporate artificial intelligence, institutional broker FalconX is launching an AI trading assistant.

title: What You Actually Get When You Buy Bitcoin
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: Learn why the place you purchase and store Bitcoin matter, and how to protect your digital assets

title: The Tiny Kingdom Of Bhutan Secretly Held Millions Of Dollars In Cryptocurrency
author: Iain Martin
description: The Himalayan kingdom has quietly been dumping millions of dollars into bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. Its investments, which have never been publicly disclosed, were revealed in the bankruptcy filings of lenders BlockFi and Celsius.

title: ‘The Devil In Nerd’s Clothes’: How Sam Bankman-Fried’s Cult Of Genius Fooled Everyone
author: David Jeans
description: Crypto insiders paint a picture of a charismatic tech founder who became the darling of high-powered investors, even as he was brazen about his cryptocurrency exchange’s shaky business model and kept the books closed to all but a few confidants.

title: Fintech 50 2022: The Newcomers
author: Jeff Kauflin
description: For our seventh annual Fintech 50, 25 of our picks have never appeared on the list. Crypto companies and startups trying to make banking cheaper and more accessible for small businesses made a particularly strong showing.

title: Crypto Exchanges: What Investors Need To Know
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: Crypto exchanges were developed as a simple way for investors to buy digital assets. Learn about the difference between centralized and decentralized exchanges.

title: What Binance’s Exit Means For The Future Of Crypto Exchanges In Canada
author: Kamran Rosen
description: Binance, the world’s largest crypto-trading platform, made waves when it tweeted that it would no longer be offering service to Canadian customers due to new guidance.

title: Crypto’s Future After The Storm: Fintech 50 2023
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: Crypto’s nightmarish 2022 exposed the weak underbelly of many blue chips in the sector. Now, firms focused on core infrastructure and analytics are leading the way.

title: Shining A Light On Crypto Market Capitalization
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: A simple definition for market cap is the value of all outstanding shares by the current share price.

title: How Sam Bankman-Fried Sold The Bahamas An Empty Crypto Dream
author: Sarah Emerson
description: The FTX founder blew into the island nation with promises of prosperity and philanthropy. After he allegedly oversaw the use of customer deposits to fuel risky crypto trading, Bankman-Fried’s empire collapsed — and Bahamians are reeling from yet another scandal.

title: Inside Tether, Crypto’s (So Far) Unbreakable Buck
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: Amid crypto’s existential crisis, its largest liquidity provider, Tether, has withstood multiple multi-billion dollar redemption runs. Will competition from rival stablecoins like USDC and regulatory pressure force Tether to finally come clean?

title: ‘Confident’ Ripple CEO Helps The XRP Price Suddenly Outperform Bitcoin
author: Billy Bambrough
description: Ripple chief executive Brad Garlinghouse has predicted the company's legal battle will conclude in "weeks not months"—boosting the XRP price by 10% over the last week...

title: Bitcoin Suisse CEO: The Next Bull Market Is Coming, And We Will Be Ready
author: Martin Leo Rivers
description: Don’t expect another hype-driven market cycle, says Dr. Dirk Klee. Regulatory rail guards and the end of cheap money will make the next bitcoin bull run different.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried Keeps Bailing Out The Crypto Industry
author: Maria Gracia Santillana Linares
description: Winning bid for Voyager Digital’s assets and customers marks another rescue on the billionaire’s scorecard.

title: Customers Of Crypto Billionaires Winklevoss’ Gemini Plead For Lost Funds
author: John Hyatt

title: Crypto Project Polkadot’s Three-Year Engagement With The SEC Leaves It In Regulatory Limbo

title: BlockFi CEO Ignored FTX Warnings, Overruled Risk Team, Report Finds

description: Zac Prince reportedly told staffers to “get comfortable” with adding exposure to FTX as it sought a lifeline for his business.

title: American Express Announces First Crypto Rewards Credit Card On Its Network

description: The card, developed in partnership with crypto wealth manager Abra, will transact in U.S. dollars and offer crypto back on any purchase category and amount. The rollout is expected later this year.
